sentences.en: A flammable gaseous fraction of petroleum, consisting chiefly of butane.
sentences.cn: 粗丁''.'烷'.''石油中易燃的气体部分, 主要由丁''.'烷'. ''组成.

sentences.en: A mathematical model was established for catalytic dehydrogenation of butane in plug flow membrane reactor.
sentences.cn: 建立了模拟真实实验室膜反应器的数学模型:活塞流数学模型.

sentences.en: Butane and butylenes has the same characteristic with propane and propylene.
sentences.cn: 丁烯与丁烷表现出与丙烯、丙烷相似的特性.

sentences.en: Butane is found into both oil and natural gas.
sentences.cn: 丁烷气体是从石油和天然气中找到的.

sentences.en: Buying a new butane soldering torch was a challenge.
sentences.cn: 购买一台新丁烷焊炬是一个挑战。

sentences.en: In 1999, a jury found Koch Industries guilty of negligence and malice in the deaths of two Texas teen-agers in an explosion that resulted from a leaky underground butane pipeline.
sentences.cn: 1999年，陪审团在一次裁决中判定德克萨斯州地下丁烷管道泄漏引发爆炸，致两名未成年人死亡是由于科赫工业的玩忽职守。

sentences.en: Its main components include propane, butane and butylene.
sentences.cn: 主要成份是丙烷 、 丁烷、丁烯等.

sentences.en: Liquefied petroleum gases, such as propane and butane, have not been included As they are too numerous to mention.
sentences.cn: 由于它们数量众多，无法一一提及，液化石油气体，如丙烷和丁烷没有包括在这里。

sentences.en: Mandy Joye: And there’s also propane and butane, and gases that derive from the same processes that make the oil.
sentences.cn: 曼迪•乔伊：泄露的还有丙烷和丁烷等气体，这些气体是在石油钻取过程中产生的。

sentences.en: Other are less common, can include ethane, propane, butane and light and heavy naphtha.
sentences.cn: 其它不常用的原材料包括乙烷 、 丙烷 、 丁烷以及轻、重石脑油.

sentences.en: Portable stove such as butane or charcoal.
sentences.cn: 便携炉，比如丁烷或木炭

sentences.en: Propane and butane can be stored and transported as a mixture or separately.
sentences.cn: 丙烷与丁烷可作为混合物储存和运输，也可分开储存运输。

sentences.en: The butane conversion of catalyst aged in different pH has similar value.
sentences.cn: 在不同pH值老化的催化剂先驱体,经活化后对丁烷的转化率基本相同.

sentences.en: The main component in 4 # solvent is liquefied butane.
sentences.cn: 四 号 溶剂主要成分为液化丁烷.

sentences.en: The polyhedral flame has been observed clearly when butane burns in some laminar, conditions.
sentences.cn: 在一定条件下,层流预混气体燃烧过程中可清晰地观察到多棱火焰现象.

sentences.en: The polyhedral flame has been observed when butane burns in some laminar conditions.
sentences.cn: 在丁烷层流预混气体的燃烧过程中清晰地观察到多棱火焰现象.

sentences.en: The studies in the catalysts for dehydroisomerization of n - butane are reviewed.
sentences.cn: 综述了正丁烷一 步脱 氢异构催化剂的研究现状.

trans.tran_en: a gas stored in liquid form, used for cooking and heating
